attributes.review: OUT OF EVERY APP THAT I HAVE EVER DOWNLOADED THIS APP WAS BY FAR THE WORST, you think this app would be a good app because the big orange man made it, it was horrible, it took up storage that I could’ve used for actual stuff that matters. Big orange men DONT MATTER DONT SUPPORT THE BIG ORANGE MAN!!!! - Karen (if this can change a Karen’s mind it can change yours too)
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: After downloading this, I kept having bad dreams and the dreams lead me sleep walk, and one night, I caught myself about to hang up a trump flag😣😣. I was terrified and all day, I kept repeating “make America great again”. Do NOT download this app😖🧚🦋
attributes.title: Almost lead me to do disgusting things🤢🤢

attributes.review: I haven’t even opened the app and it’s already the worst thing I’ve seen. Maybe your president needs to stay off Twitter and actually solve some of our real world problems. Thanks-Gen Z
attributes.title: Doesn’t even open

attributes.review: Honestly trump is a horrible president, he’s done nothing but bad for the country. I wanted to try and find a reason to support him but no, if you can’t do anything for that country much less raise your child, you shouldn’t be president.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: This app actually ruined my life! It allowed the russians to hack my phone! The app barely even works too, i turned it on and it was just a white screen and then i got a notification saying my phone had been compromised!
attributes.title: THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE

attributes.review: I got this app hoping that I could see Trumps campaigns point of view and not the media’s. Don’t be fooled. I now can confirm that this campaigns mission is to divide our country. His attack on our youth by trying to remove Tik Tok is the definition of censorship from a dictator.
attributes.title: Offensive

attributes.review: this is the WORST app ever! it took weeks to download and gives me information on the worst president ever! who would want this app when you hear about his terrible plans and takes weeks to download
attributes.title: app

attributes.review: This app took months to download but when I finally opened it all I could see was a blank screen have not been able to use the app. AND I am not able to delete the app any more🤬🤬🤬😡🤮
attributes.title: Do Not download!!!!!

attributes.review: Honestly this is one of the worst apps I’ve had, I didn’t support trump I the first place but just wanted to see what the app was about. I go on n the app and It just makes no sense, there is truly no point in the app what so ever.
attributes.title: This app is terrible

attributes.review: The app took weeks to download. I downloaded the app to  attempt to find a good reason to vote from our  so called president but sadly I failed! This app is horrendously terrible! I repeat do not get this app it mad me phone turn orange😪 and I am not sure y?!!! So *DO NOT GET THIS APP*
attributes.title: Do not get!
